document_title: Testicular torsion: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, treatment
subsection_content:
There is currently no method for early prevention of testicular torsion.; Rarely, torsion occurs on both sides. If doctors remove one testicle, the remaining testicle is still capable of producing enough sperm to conceive. However, people who have had testicular torsion will often have lower than normal sperm counts.; Sometimes, the remaining testicle will grow larger than the balance. Therefore, men should consider wearing protective clothing when exercising and playing sports to protect their organs from unnecessary injury.
